text: Yakshcho zh vy boyitesʹ, shcho ne budete nalezhno stavytysʹ do syrit, to odruzhuytesʹ iz tymy zhinkamy, yaki vam do vpodoby: z dvoma, z trʹoma, z chotyrma. Ta yakshcho vy boyitesʹ, shcho ne budete spravedlyvi iz nymy, to nekhay tse bude lyshe odna abo zh nevilʹnytsya, zakhoplena vamy. Tse blyzhche [do spravedlyvosti], yakshcho ne prahnete vidkhylytysya vy
